caption.p: IOE decreases cardiomyocyte apoptosis. (A) Representative images of TUNEL staining (scale bar, 100 µm). (B) Cardiomyocyte apoptosis index. Data are presented as the mean ± standard deviation. n=4. ##P<0.01 vs. Sham. *P<0.05, **P<0.01 vs. MI/R. IOE, Inonotus obliquus extract; MI/R, myocardial ischemia/reperfusion.
